name: Nat.cast_finsetSup'
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemiring R
s : Finset ι
f : ι → Nat
hs : s.Nonempty
⊢ Eq (↑(s.sup' hs f)) (s.sup' hs fun i => ↑(f i))
decl:
set_option linter.docPrime false in
@[simp, norm_cast]
lemma cast_finsetSup' (f : ι → ℕ) (hs) : ((s.sup' hs f : ℕ) : R) = s.sup' hs fun i ↦ (f i : R) :=
  comp_sup'_eq_sup'_comp _ _ cast_max

name: Nat.cast_finsetInf'
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemiring R
s : Finset ι
f : ι → Nat
hs : s.Nonempty
⊢ Eq (↑(s.inf' hs f)) (s.inf' hs fun i => ↑(f i))
decl:
set_option linter.docPrime false in
@[simp, norm_cast]
lemma cast_finsetInf' (f : ι → ℕ) (hs) : (↑(s.inf' hs f) : R) = s.inf' hs fun i ↦ (f i : R) :=
  comp_inf'_eq_inf'_comp _ _ cast_min

name: Nat.cast_finsetSup
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedSemiring R
inst✝ : CanonicallyOrderedAdd R
s : Finset ι
f : ι → Nat
⊢ Eq (↑(s.sup f)) (s.sup fun i => ↑(f i))
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
lemma cast_finsetSup [CanonicallyOrderedAdd R] (s : Finset ι) (f : ι → ℕ) :
    (↑(s.sup f) : R) = s.sup fun i ↦ (f i : R) :=
  comp_sup_eq_sup_comp _ cast_max (by simp)
